A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: That was the quickest long movie in a long time. I was not sure what to expect as I heard or read nothing that would constitute a spoiler review or anything to impassioned either way. The reward for the sequestering was amazing. The only thing keeping this from a 5-star were a couple things like some of the little CG rodent character bits that seemed forcibly injected. I get the merchandising and Disney thing\, but those scenes did nothing for me. There are a few other big things like a huge powerful ruler out of nowhere\, and leadership keeping plans\, rationale\, or intent to themselves for inexplicable reasons. In every respect this movie was superb. I keep thinking that the CG and effects will eventually disappoint but that certainly is not the case with this movie. I get the transitioning out of the old and into the new. And from where I am sitting the future of the franchise is in terrific hands. I cannot wait for the next installment. Beautiful\, amazing\, and worthy of repeat visits on the big screen\, this movie is.
